{"id":537304449,"lang":"cpp","time":"1Â month","timestamp":1628762976,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/537304449/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Pivot Index","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int pivotIndex(vector<int>& nums) {        \n        if(nums.size()==1)return 0;\n        int prev=0;\n        for(int i=0;i<nums.size();i++)\n        {\n            nums[i]=nums[i]+prev;            \n            prev=nums[i];\n        }        \n        if(nums[nums.size()-1]-nums[0]==0)return 0;\n        if(nums[nums.size()-2]==0)return (nums.size()-1);\n        for(int i=1;i<nums.size()-1;i++)\n        {\n            if(nums[nums.size()-1]-nums[i]==nums[i-1])return i;\n        }\n        return -1;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-pivot-index"}
